item.description:
Make plans to join us this Easter Sunday for:

dinner and a show
or
dinner only
or
show only


We're having dinner at Orleans because Johnny D's kitchen closes at 7:30PM on Sundays.

Therefore let's meet in Orleans, which is at 65 Holland Street, for dinner and conversation at 8:00PM then walk five (5) minutes to Johnny D's, which is at 17 Holland Street, to enjoy the lively powerful sounds of Brazil by Bloco AfroBrazil which begins after 9:30PM.

Once the drums, singing and dancing begins group conversation will be difficult. Let's just enjoy the party!

Orleans Restaurant Menu

$10 cash cover charge at the door for Bloco AfroBrazil show at Johnny D's

Bloco AfroBrazil details

Johnny D's drinks

Johnny D's driving and mbta directions
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for Tonya/Meetup reservation or call/text my cell (617) 445 7549

group.name: The Boston/Cambridge Portuguese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Dinner@Orleans 8PM & Show-Bloco AfroBrazil@Johnny D's 9:30PM Sunday April 12th
